Literature.Title: Disruption of interactions between hydrophobic residues on nonpolar faces is a key determinant in decreasing hemolysis and increasing antimicrobial activities of α-helical amphipathic peptides.
Literature.Author: Son M, Lee Y, Hwang H, Hyun S, Yu J

Literature.Title: Reduction of helical content by insertion of a disulfide bond leads to an antimicrobial peptide with decreased hemolytic activity
